name: ArtioLighting
0:
”Alexa, set all lights to red.”
”Alexa, activate scene 1.”
”Alexa, dim well light to 50 percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill is used to activate scenes created in the artio application as well as control individual lights which are also stored in the artio app.
